name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># Remember that airships are almost the only source of new resources</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># You can also disable specific airship from spawn</field></block></value><next><block you possibility to disable specific mob from
